title: Pour Down on Me, Holy Spirit

verses.html:
1
Pour down on me, Holy Spirit,
Fill my heart with Thy grace;
Lord, keep me in Thy presence,
Lest I turn from Thy face.

2
Thou canst fill me, precious Spirit,
Unto Thee will I bow;
I need Thee to guide me,
Come and dwell with me now.

3
I am weak, Lord, lend me strength now,
Fill my heart with Thy love;
Keep me on Thy pathway,
With Thy pow’r from above.

4
May the stream of living water
Fill my heart to the end,
Until in Thy kingdom,
I will ne’er thirst again.
